name: Winter Moon
summary:
一个基佬法师与一个碧池牧师在Online RPG里偶然相遇的故事。

A homosexual sorceror and a seductive priestess cross paths in an Online RPG.

Art by http://mayuichan17.deviantart.com/ 
Story by https://twitter.com/Merryweatherey
info:
